title: How to Comment and Delete Comments on Instagram Photos

steps.title: Open your Instagram app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open your Instagram app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. Make sure you are signed in to your Instagram account. When you open the Instagram app, you will be taken to your Feed.

steps.title: Browse for the post that you want to comment on.
steps.content: Browse for the post that you want to comment on. You can comment on your own posts or any posts from users that you are following. Tap on the post to open it.

steps.title: Tap the Comment icon.
steps.content: Tap the Comment icon. This is the speech bubble between the heart and the airplane icon. The Comments section of the post will open.

steps.title: Enter your comment.
steps.content: Enter your comment. Tap the comment field at the bottom of the screen to open your on-screen keyboard. You can enter any text you'd like; just be sure it falls under Instagram's Community Guidelines. Tap the sticker icon on the right side of the field to upload an avatar or GIF . Instagram may suggest emojis at the top of your keyboard. Tap an emoji to quickly add it to your comment.

steps.title: Tap the blue arrow.
steps.content: Tap the blue arrow. This can be found on the right of the text field. Your comment will be posted. If you made a mistake or you want to remove your comment, you can easily delete it .

steps.title: Browse for the post you have commented on.
steps.content: Browse for the post you have commented on. You can only delete your own comments on pictures, or others’ comments on your own pictures. [1] X Research source If you don't have the Instagram app, you can also delete comments on the web .

steps.title: Tap and hold the comment you want to delete.
steps.content: Tap and hold the comment you want to delete. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This is the red trash can icon. You'll only see this option if you made the comment. If you see a comment that is inappropriate or offensive, you can tap and hold the comment and then tap Report .

steps.title: Delete multiple comments (optional).
steps.content: Delete multiple comments (optional). If you have a lot of comments you need to remove at once, you can do so easily using your activity options. Do the following: Tap your profile picture. Tap ☰ Menu . Tap Your activity underneath How you use Instagram . Tap Comments underneath Interaction . Filter the comments if necessary. Tap Select in the top-right. Tap the comments you want to delete. Tap Delete twice.

steps.title: Log in to the Instagram website in a web browser.
steps.content: Log in to the Instagram website in a web browser. You can use any desktop web browser.

steps.title: Find a post that you want to comment on.
steps.content: Find a post that you want to comment on. You can comment on posts in your Feed, or posts that you have uploaded.

steps.title: Click the Comment icon.
steps.content: Click the Comment icon. This is the speech bubble between the heart and the airplane icon. The Comments section of the post will open.

steps.title: Enter your comment.
steps.content: Enter your comment. Click the comment field at the bottom of the screen. You can enter any text you'd like; just be sure it falls under Instagram's Community Guidelines. Click the sticker icon on the right side of the field to upload an avatar or GIF.

steps.title: Click the blue arrow.
steps.content: Click the blue arrow. This can be found on the right of the text field. Your comment will be posted. If you made a mistake or you want to remove your comment, you can easily delete it .

steps.title: Log in to the Instagram website in a web browser.
steps.content: Log in to the Instagram website in a web browser. You can use any desktop web browser.

steps.title: Hover your cursor over the comment.
steps.content: Hover your cursor over the comment. This will show more options.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . This is next to the comment.

steps.title: Click Delete.
steps.content: Click Delete . The comment will be deleted. You'll only see this option if you made the comment. If you see a comment that is inappropriate or offensive, hover over the comment, click the three-dots icon, and then click Report .

steps.title: Delete multiple comments (optional).
steps.content: Delete multiple comments (optional). If you have a lot of comments you need to remove at once, you can do so using your activity options. Do the following: Click ☰ Menu on the bottom left. Click Your activity. Click Interactions . Click Comments . Click Sort & Filter to filter the comments if necessary. Click Select in the top-right. Click the comments you want to delete. Click Delete twice.

steps.title: Make sure you created the comment.
steps.content: Make sure you created the comment. Currently, you can only delete your own comments on other people's Instagram posts and comments that other people added to your own posts. If you didn't make the comment you want to have removed from somebody else's photo, you can either ask the uploader to remove it or report the comment to Instagram.

steps.title: Clear your app cache.
steps.content: Clear your app cache. If you're having trouble deleting your own comments on Instagram, try clearing your app's cache. If you're using an Android, you can clear the cache in your Settings . If you're on an iPhone or iPad , you'll need to reinstall the Instagram app to clear its cache.
